transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Pawan ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu. Abhi baat ho sakti hai sir hamari?
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Sir, aapki services regarding maine call kiya tha. Aap us din busy the last day to isiliye maine abhi call kiya. Aapne bola tha ki aap morning mein call kar lijiyega.
Customer: Bataiye bataiye.
Executive: To services vgera kaisi chal rahi hai sir aapki?
Customer: Ji, theek chal rahi hai abhi.
Executive: Leads vgera aap proper consume kar rahe ho? Inquiries calls vgera kaisi aa rahi hai sir? Proper aap follow up le rahe ho?
Customer: [inaudible] kya? Aap bataiyega.
Executive: Sir, mere ko to yaha pe show ho rahi hai ki aapko aa rahi hai achi. Aap unse follow up vgera mein ho. Like calls vgera bhi aap receive kar rahe ho achi thi. Jo bhi calls aa rahe hai sari cheeze. Buyleads bas aap thoda kam use kar rahe ho. Buyleads ka kya issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Buyleads issue mein ko [unintelligible] phone laga ke [unintelligible].
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Buyleads pe actual mein pata nahi chalta ki kab wo jo aur jo mere kaam ki rehti hai wo jaise hi aati hai to wo nikal jati hai wo automatic.
Executive: Matlab nikal jati hai matlab sold out ho jati hai?
Customer: Matlab wo sold out ho jati hai wo.
Executive: Aapne mere ko ek baar bataya tha ki sold out wali jo hai wo kaise dekhte hai?
Executive: Wo aap past leads mein jaake dekh sakte ho. Last mein aapko ek option aata hai past leads karke. To waha pe agar aap I am interested haan I am interested karoge na to fir aage se aapko uski leads aana shuru kar jati hai matlab agar aati hai to wo aapko show karti hai. Us related matlab quantity ya fir product value jo bhi hai. Jaise ki abhi ek lead aa rakhi hai MST structures and wooden ball epoxy rising.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi wo apne kaam ki nahi hai wo apne kaam ki nahi hai.
Executive: Epoxy resin mein nahi karte ho aap?
Customer: Epoxy basically epoxy usme karta hu main jo dekhiye YD mere paas mein jo available hai wo ek matra product available hai YD 120 karke hai. Wo jo hai uske aate nahi hai ye 5-5 kilo 10-10 kilo mangte hai. Mere paas mein to 2-200 kilo ke drum hai wo.
Executive: Kyunki sir epoxy ki pata hai aapko kyun aa rahi hai? Kyunki aapka epoxy resin ka ek product added hai. Industrial applications 235 kg ka. Isi wajah se uski aa rahi hai aapko leads.
Customer: [inaudible] agar wo kaam ki rahi agar kaam ki rahegi to theek hai dekh lenge.
Executive: Hmm. Accha. Wo achi aur hmm ji ji.
Executive: Aaj aapne koi lead consume ki?
Customer: Nahi aaj nahi ki hai.
Executive: Aaj nahi ki aapne kal matlab post ko ki thi aapne. Ek lead Raju Kumar karke buyer ka name tha. To unse baat hui aapki?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Kya hua sir matlab koi deal hui?
Customer: Nahi meri nahi nahi nahi deal vgera to nahi hui hai. Actual mein ye kya hai ki call main nahi lagata hu. Main lead consume karke jo call karte hai unhe main de deta hu. Unka follow up mujhe lena padta hai.
Executive: Owner aap hi ho ya fir koi aur hai?
Customer: Owner main hi hu. Owner main aur [unintelligible].
Executive: Accha handle koi aur karte honge?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Accha ye aapki partnership form hai?
Customer: Partnership form hai ye.
Executive: Ah okay okay. Ah okay. Actual mein leads jo maine ab main jo mera kaise dekh sakta hu? Maine jo leads consume kari hai wo kaise dekh sakta hu?
Executive: Leads consume jo aapne ki hai wo aapke usme aa jayengi. Sari lead manager mein aapke unke contact numbers aa jate hai sir. Jo bhi aapne ki hai. Agar aap unke sath follow up mein rahoge unke sath jaise aapne apna catalog sab aap na ye kiya karo jab bhi aap koi lead consume kar rahe ho suppose abhi aapne koi lead consume ki aap na directly unhe bas itna kar diya kare us time pe hi jaise consume pe aapne click kiya and then waha pe aapko ek catalog share ka option bhi aata hai. Aap wahi ke wahi catalog bhi share kar diya karo to na aapke paas sari details aapki pe rahengi. Aap kabhi busy bhi ho jate ho us time pe to ye to hai ki aapke paas baad mein number hai ho sakta hai aap us time pe bhul jao ki maine kisko connect kiya tha kaunsi lead consume ki aapko yaad nahi aa raha. Lekin agar aap apne lead manager mein dekhoge catalog share hoga to aapko pata hoga haan maine inse baat ki thi ye lead consume ki thi mujhe inse baat karni hai. To sari leads ko na jo bhi consume karo aap us time pe unhe catalog share kar diya karo. Jisse ki unko bhi ek overview rahe ki haan aapki product line ye hai isme itne products hai matlab is isme aap deal karte ho. To aapne jo consume ki aap aage unse easily matlab matlab baat kar sakte ho is. To quick call ho sakti hai aapki unke sath ki haan matlab ye hai.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Aur jaise abhi aap thoda consume kam kar rahe the leads ko to uski wajah se jaise pehle aapko kaafi achi inquiries aa rahi thi calls aa rahi jaise last month bhi achi aayi hai usse pehle bhi achi aayi hai. Is month thoda sa down hua hai matlab aa rahi hai but thodi kam hui hai. To aap wahi hai ki aap agar in jo leads hai na agar ache se aap consume karoge na to samne se direct inquiries aur direct calls ka flow bhi increase hoga. Jo ki thoda sa kam ho gaya hai kyunki aap thoda lead pe aap thoda kam ho gaye ho isliye.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: To unko leads vgera ko aur sir mujhe ek concern aur tha aapka jo aapki mail ID hai hamare paas sir uska na like hamare paas ek concern raise hua tha ki hamari side se IndiaMART se jo bhi mails vgera hai na wo aapko receive nahi ho rahe hai. Kyunki aapka jo mail ID hai wo full uska inbox full ho chuka hai. To is possible ya to aap usme se jo bhi past ke mails hai aap unko delete kar do. Or else aap agar koi aur mail ID hai to aap wo kar sakte ho. Haan aap ye option hai ki agar aapko mail ID change karna hai to aap mail ID change kar sakte ho. Or else aap inbox ko khali kar sakte ho. Kyunki fir ye concern aa raha tha hamari side se aapko jo bhi matlab hamari side se mails ja rahe the jo bhi IndiaMART ke wo aapke paas nahi ja pa rahe the aapke inbox aapka full tha is wajah se.
Customer: Main ek actual mein main ID dali maine persa chemicals@gmail.com to uske niche likha aa raha hai your all emails should be unique so please enter different email address.
Executive: Haan matlab aapne jo ek second ek second haan.
Executive: Aapki jo email ID hai hamare paas do hai. Jaise ki ek P se start hai kyunki hame show nahi karte @gmail.com aur ek hai PAM something in gmail. Jo first wali email ID hai na aapki aapne kaunsa aapne bola hai? Aapne abhi kaunsa email ID bola hai?
Customer: Main do do laga ke dekhiye maine do laga ke rakhe hue hai pawan828@gmail.com.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aur ek laga ke rakha hai persa chemicals ek laga ke rakha hai persa chemicals@gmail.com.
Executive: Haan to aapka jo pawan wala hai na wo inbox full hai.
Customer: To usko aapko ya to aapko [unintelligible] login ID ko change kar sakte hai kya persa chemicals kar sakte hai kya?
Executive: Agar aapko dusri email ID karni hai to aap usko kar sakte ho. Isko hata ke aap dusri email ID laga sakte ho or else iska inbox khali kar sakte ho. Main agar persa chemicals@gmail.com dal raha hu haan to kyunki wo aapki secondary mein hai mail. Isi wajah se waha pe option aa raha hai ki aapko different email ID lagani hogi. Aap ye kar sakte ho aap wo email ID ko hata do and then secondary se aap usko pehle jo aapki secondary pe mail hai na jo aapka something chemicals karke jo hai second wali usko aap remove kar do pehle and then fir first jo primary hai usko hata ke aap secondary ko kar do. Remove karna padegi wo kaha pe jaake remove karna padegi? Wahi se hi edit ka option aayega aapko ek pencil ka sign ban ke aata hai waha se aap hata sakte ho. Aapko OTP vgera aayega and then wo directly aap usko remove kar sakte ho.
Customer: IndiaMART pe gaya. Hmm. Pencil ka option aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan waha pe edit ka option aayega aapko waha se aap kar sakte ho edit.
Customer: Ah persa chemicals@gmail.com nahi aisa kuch nahi aa raha madam.
Executive: Aapne usko hataya email ID ko?
Customer: Email ID ko update update kaise karu matlab waha pe kaise karu?
Executive: Waha pe aapko [unintelligible] kaunsi ID likh du?
Executive: Usko jab aap hataoge na aap hata ke usko refresh karo to wo hat jayegi aapko waha se and then fir haan fir first se aap hata ke aap jo mail ID lagana chahte ho aap wo laga do.
Customer: Laga dijiye.
Executive: Same jaise aapne second ko hataya hai waise hi aap usko primary pe laga do.
Customer: Ji ji laga di laga di save ho gaya. Haan ho gaya. To aapka mail ID update ho gaya hoga na?
Customer: Mail ID update ho gaya hai ab main jata hu kaha pe mere lead manager pe. Hmm hmm. Lead manager pe gaya. Haan bataiye ab lead manager pe.
Executive: Ab aapke jo bhi mails vgera receive honge to jo aapne ID mention ki hai na usi par hi honge sare.
Customer: Theek hai. Sare [unintelligible].
Customer: Theek. Ab main kar diya na? Theek hai? Haan ho gayi aapki mail ID. Theek hai? Haan aur sir mujhe ek cheez aur puchni thi. Ah hello. Hmm. Hello. Sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko? Haan ji. Aa rahi hai aa rahi hai. Sir actually mujhe ye bhi puchna tha aapse ki hamara renewal generated tha. To sir hum same services mein apna renewal karenge or else services matlab hum upgrade karenge like dusri services TrustSeal vgera usme. Same services mein hi karenge abhi same services mein. Hmm. Sir same mein kyunki already hum ek saal se same mein hi kar rahe hai to upgrade nahi karenge ki matlab kyunki aapke mein to kaafi competition vgera bhi hai. Nahi nahi nahi. Same mein hi karenge. To sir isko fir hum kaise karenge matlab agar hame same mein bhi apna renewal karna hai kyunki generated hai already fir agar baad mein agar hame karna hoga to us time pe fir hame agar services change bhi karni hai to bhi nahi ho payega. To February mein hai na wo February mein hogi na? Haan sir actually hamara jo renewal hai wo hamara generated hota hai. Ek second just a second main aapko bata rahi hu aapka last date tha. Mam abhi iske bare mein to apan baad mein bhi kar sakte hai ispe to apan charcha baad mein bhi kar sakte hai abhi to January mein matlab December hai abhi January hai. Hai na? Hmm. Okay apan ispe to charcha kar sakte hai thoda. Okay. Ah theek hai like main aapko aap agar baad mein December time pe karna chahte ho to aap us time pe bhi kar sakte ho no worries kyunki abhi isme generated tha to aap us time pe kar sakte ho. Okay okay theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issues with buyleads usage.

- Not receiving emails from IndiaMART.

- Renewal-related query.



Resolution:

- Explained how to check sold-out leads.

- Provided steps to resolve email delivery issue.

- Discussed renewal options and timeline.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will update email ID.

- Renewal discussion deferred to December.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, email, renewal, subscription, catalog
